head.supplied: ¶ [Dr F. Mueller, Director of the botanical and zoological garden of Melbourne, recently named Correspondent of the Museum, ¶ writes to record his thanks and appreciation on the occasion of his nomi...

div.p: To the Muséum d’Histoire Naturelle, Paris

Letter not found. The text given here is an extract from a copy of the Procès verbal
of the assembly of administrative professors of the Muséum d’Histoire Naturelle held on 18 November 1862 (Archives Nationales, Paris, F it 3883). The letter is dated to early October 1862 as the latest possible date on which it could have been written in order to be reported to the assembly at its meeting on 18 November.
[M. le Dr. F. Mueller, Directeur du jardin botanique et zoologique de Melbourne, récemment nommé Correspondant du Muséum s’écrit pour faire parvenir ses remerciments et l’expression de sa reconnaissance, à l’occasion de sa nomination, et témoigner de son vif désir de contribuer à l’enrichissement des collections du Muséum en satisfaisant le mieux qu’il lui sera possible aux demandes qu’on lui adressera. Les mêmes assurances se trouvent répétées dans une lettre particulière au professeur d’Erpétologie auquel il annonce un nouvel envoi.]

[Dr F. Mueller, Director of the botanical and zoological garden of Melbourne, recently named Correspondent of the Museum,
See Muséum d’Histoire Naturelle, Paris to M, 22 July 1862 (in this edition as 62-07-22a) and 23 July 1862.
writes to record his thanks and appreciation on the occasion of his nomination, and to attest his lively desire to contribute to the enriching of the Museum’s collections by satisfying as best he can the requests addressed to him. The same assurances are repeated in a personal letter to the Professor of Herpetology
Auguste Duméril; letter not found
to whom he announces a new sending.]
